tools.name: zotero_item_metadata
tools.description: Get metadata information about a specific Zotero item, given the item key.

tools.name: zotero_item_fulltext
tools.description: Get the full text content of a Zotero item, given the item key of a parent item or specific attachment.

tools.name: zotero_search_items
tools.description: Search for items in your Zotero library, given a query string, query mode (titleCreatorYear or everything), and optional tag search (supports boolean searches). Returned results can be looked up with zotero_item_fulltext or zotero_item_metadata.

zotero_search_items.purpose: 验证使用默认查询模式对Zotero库进行基本搜索是否正常工作

response.result: No items found matching your query.

response.result:
## Doc2Agent: Scalable Generation of Tool-Using Agents from API Documentation
Item Key: `GB3AVERM`
Type: preprint
Date: 2025-06-24
Authors: Ni, Xinyi; Jian, Haonan; Wang, Qiuyang; Shah, Vedanshi Chetan; Hong, Pengyu

### Abstract
REST APIs play important roles in enriching the action space of web agents, yet most API-based agents rely on curated and uniform toolsets that do not reflect the complexity of real-world APIs. Building tool-using agents for arbitrary domains remains a major challenge, as it requires reading unstructured API documentation, testing APIs and inferring correct parameters. We propose Doc2Agent, a scalable pipeline to build agents that can call Python-based tools generated from API documentation. Doc2Agent generates executable tools from API documentations and iterativ...[截断]，共计1521字符，剩余721字符
